clientSide.entities

Class Chef

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • clientSide.entities.Chef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Chef
extends java.lang.Thread
    Chef thread. Used to simulate the Chef life cycle. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
